summary: Implements a diffusion pipeline that combines the Stable Diffusion XL model family with K‑diffusion samplers, offering a unified interface for text‑to‑image generation. The module wraps the VAE, UNet, and CLIP components, integrates LoRA, IP‑Adapter, and textual inversion loading utilities, and provides advanced noise scheduling (Karras, Brownian tree) and denoising strategies for flexible image synthesis.
business_intent: Enable developers and artists to generate high‑quality images from textual prompts using the latest Stable Diffusion XL architecture while leveraging K‑diffusion sampling techniques and extensible model adaptations such as LoRA and IP‑Adapter for customized creative workflows.
